name: The Peanut and Boris
description:
Small outsourced demo from the big vision. Here you can try your skills against a peanut. There are 3 hotspots you can move the peanut to. The ants keep bringing the peanut back to you. Boris is a veggie.

Best playable with game controller - but also with A-W-D-S or arrow keys - Jump with Space-Key  or Action-Button on controller.

Best times are collected per run. Perfect to measure yourself against friends in skill.

Have fun!
